text: Hummus salad () is an Arab salad. It typically consists of dry chickpea, soda carbonate, lemon juice, garlic, tahini, salt, olive oil, and cumin. Is one of the popular salads known in the Arab world.There are many different versions of the Hummus Salad which contain additional ingredients such as: coriander,sweet paprika, turmeric, pepper, chopped mint, chopped onions, and parsley. Because of all the ingredients the Hummus salad is considered very nutritious and healthy. Many vegans around the world favor this dish according to its nutritional benefits it serves as a good replacement for their dietary restrictions. ==See also== * List of Arab salads * List of salads * ==References== Category:Arab cuisine Category:Salads
title: Hummus salad
